statement:
The series $a_1\!+\!a_2\!+\!a_3\!+\cdots$ with positive is

-   convergent if, starting from some value of $n$, its fulfil the
    condition $$\frac{a_{n+1}}{a_n} \leqq 1-\frac{\mu}{n}$$ where $\mu$
    is a and $> 1$;

-   divergent if, starting from some value of $n$, its fulfil the
    condition $$\frac{a_{n+1}}{a_n} \geqq 1-\frac{1}{n}-\frac{M}{n^2}$$
    where $M$ is a .
